title: Twitch Viable (5.9 adc)
body:
Is twitch viable in 5.9 all i want is a simple yes and short description why, not HES ONLY GOOD LATE GAME GOD JUST PLAY JINX AND GRAVES BRONZE 5 NOOBSCRUB GOD! yeah lol, i recently got  3150 ip from farming which takes so long to do without boosters and wanted to buy twitch bcz he is cool and dat ssw skin doe

EDIT: best possible non fed build? (just items)

replies.body:
F*ck I hate Graves.

I think he's actually quite good but he has a weak early game.

More than anything I think it depends on your support: Janna, Sona and Nami being good because they can help him get to mid game with their peek etc since he doesn't have an escape besides Stealth and/or slows and their heals/shields help too - as well as their ulti's. He is good with Leona because she guarantees him stacks of his passive which is actually quite strong at max stacks as a trade mechanism and realistically I think he's highly viable but he is difficult to play as he needs to stealth engage and enemy traders like Lucian are strong and enemies like Leona etc can shut down his trades so if he isn't against someone who scales less he's in trouble. Tristana can wreck him as she can push waves hard from a distance so he can't do much but farm and her engage is better than his and her ult denies him a lot of time from his ulti if he engages with it.

All in all, the Botrk suits him nicely, as does Infinity Edge and Phantom Dancer - I'd actually prefer Infinity Edge and Phantom Dancer on him but some team comps call for Blade of the ruined king, or a cutlass early and this gives him nice sustain and he can proc the Blade of the Ruined King on entire teams later with his penetrating attacks from his ultimate but due to his squishy nature he needs farm and if they have junglers like Mundo etc that pressure you into performing early game he's probably not as strong a pick as a good CC'er like Jinx or a poker like Ashe however he is good against Champions with good escape mechanisms because his passive deters re-engages and he can win trades with his stealth engages.

Pinks are expensive early game.

{{item:3153}} {{item:3087}} maybe even a {{item:3046}} then mostly AD and armor pen

Edit: Banshee's or GA is a MUST HAVE late game.

Tho he does use botrk, assasin meta plz hopefully it comes along

Any AD Carry is 'viable'. I'd say he's strong-ish although he'd be pretty vulnerable to the likes of Graves, Lucian and Jinx in lane and Urgot can mess you up pretty bad one he hits Level 6 if you're on an Immobile AD Carry.

> [{quoted}](name=A Blue Quaker,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=0cVYYVEi,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-17T07:00:13.357+0000)
>
> Any AD Carry is 'viable'. I'd say he's strong-ish although he'd be pretty vulnerable to the likes of Graves, Lucian and Jinx in lane and Urgot can mess you up pretty bad one he hits Level 6 if you're on an Immobile AD Carry.

this is what i was scared of, someone coming in and saying that everyone is viable and not just giving a short yes/no desc too lol.

Lucian isnt a problem, jinx is hard and graves is meh not to worry

Yes he's strong, but it depends on what you're up against. Don't pick him into an Enemy Team with a lot of point-and-click CC (Maokai W, Urgot R, Vi R, etc). And if you do, make sure you're nowhere near the Enemy Team until you need to be (i.e. during a teamfight/pushing a tower/skirmishing) unless you're in Stealth.

Better?

> [{quoted}](name=A Blue Quaker,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=0cVYYVEi,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-05-17T07:08:01.598+0000)

yes darling ty :D
Im thinking 1 more small change might set twitch back on the road but thats prolly not gonna happen qq
I hope zed goes to a standard non high tier assasin place so twitch jungle can come take over Kappa xD, ill be sure to keep researching
